title: Full-Stack Web Development with MERN
description:
Learn to build complete web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.

What you’ll learn:
- REST APIs
- React fundamentals
- Backend with Node.js
- MongoDB schema design
- Authentication basics

Who this course is for:
- Beginners
- Aspiring full-stack developers

title: Backend Development with Node.js & Express
description:
Master backend development by building scalable APIs using Node.js and Express.

Topics covered:
- Express routing
- Middleware
- JWT authentication
- MongoDB integration

Ideal for developers who want to specialize in backend.

title: Frontend Development with React
description:
Build modern, responsive user interfaces using React.

You’ll learn:
- Components & hooks
- State management
- API integration
- Project structure

Perfect for frontend-focused learners.
